Reaction:: L-aspartate 4-semialdehyde(aq) + NADP(aq) + orthophosphate(aq) = L-4-aspartyl phosphate(aq) + NADPH(aq)
Reference:: Black S.; Wright N.G.; J. Biol. Chem.; 213 39 (1955).
Buffer:: sodium borate (0.1 mol dm-3) and imidazole chloride (0.1 mol dm-3)
